question: 固い
sourceMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an <ja>い</ja> on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>hard</kanji>? It's <vocabulary>hard</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>firm</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>tough</vocabulary>.
